mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO as bno, USER_ID as userId, CONTENT as content, REGDATE FROM COMMENTS_TABLE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS_TABLE (CNO,BOARD_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, REGDATE) VALUES (NEXTVAL(CNO_seq), #{bno}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT C.BOARD_NO, C.USER_ID, C.CONTENT, C.REGDATE, COALESCE(U.USER_NAME, '알 수 없음') AS USER_NAME FROM COMMENTS_TABLE C LEFT JOIN USER_TABLE U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
